xmlMandatorySingleRootNode.description: This is a fake object node for the DataModelDesigner to draw the object hierarchy properly. It will not be inserted into the data model. The Short Object Name must be FakeParentObject.
This is a fake object node for the DataModelDesigner to draw the object hierarchy properly. It will not be inserted into the data model. The Short Object Name must be FakeParentObject.
This object contains all DLNA related objects and parameters.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the supported DLNA Home Network Device Classes {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG|Table 4-1}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the supported DLNA Device Capabilities {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG|Table 4-2}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the supported DLNA Home Infrastructure Device Classes {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG|Table 4-4}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the DLNA Image Class Profile IDs supported by this device, from Tables 5-2 and 5-3 of {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the DLNA Audio Class Profile IDs supported by this device, from Tables 5-4 through 5-10 of {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the DLNA AV Class Profile IDs supported by this device, from Tables 5-11 through 5-15 of {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the DLNA Media Collection Profile IDs supported by this device {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG|Table 5-16}}.
Comma-separated list (maximum length 256) of strings. Indicates the DLNA Printer Class Profile IDs supported by this device {{bibref|DLNA-NDIG|Table 5-17}}.
